dct_description_sm: "Avertissement: On a ajouté à cette mappemonde les nouvelles découvertes faites par le Capitaine Cook dans ses trois differens voyages ... " Double hemispherical map of the world, showing routes of early explorers. Relief shown pictorially. Dezauche acquired in 1780 the work of Guillaume de L'Isle and his son-in-law Philippe Buache, which he re-edited and republished. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: A Paris : Chez Dezauche géographe, successeur des Srs. De Lisle et Phil. Buache, 1792.
